name: Ardour
description: Ardour is a digital audio editor. It has powerful sound console and supports multichannel recording. You can use it to make your own CD, or record, edit and mix multitrack audio and try all kinds of new ideas!

en_US.description: Ardour is a digital audio editor. It has powerful sound console and supports multichannel recording. You can use it to make your own CD, or record, edit and mix multitrack audio and try all kinds of new ideas!
en_US.name: Ardour

zh_CN.description: Ardour是一款数字音频编辑工具，它拥有一个强大的调音台，并且支持多通道的录音。您可以使用它来制作自己的CD，或者录制、编辑、混合多轨音频，尝试各种新想法！
zh_CN.name: Ardour
